result.adr_address: Derevoobrobna St, 3 В, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Bobobar Bubble TEA

reviews.text:
Boorish attitude and discrimination!
Today I had the opportunity to experience unpleasant emotions because of the cashier manager Daniil Kushnir!
He simply ignored me, I stood at the empty counter for more than 10 minutes, but they never took my order, although later the girls came up and he rushed to serve them!
This attitude towards clients degrades their dignity!
If it was possible to leave the most negative rating possible, I would do it so that this place will never discriminate against customers again!!!!

The seller, who called himself a manager, Danil Kushnir, ignored the client! A 10-year-old child wanted to place an order and stood in vain for more than 10 minutes at the empty cash register! Daniil successfully ignored him, but as soon as two girls approached he rushed to serve them! When I approached to find out why the seller was ignoring the child, Daniil began to claim that he had not noticed or simply decided that the boy was just standing at the order counter! In response to my demand to show a book of complaints and call the administrator, he boorishly replied that there was no book and I could just write a review on Google! Disgusting behavior and discrimination, boorish attitude of the staff! I don't recommend it to anyone!
